parameters.x: lerp(scrollx,camera.X - clamp(camera.X - Mouse.X, -min_camera_distance, min_camera_distance), dt * settings_cam_speed_modificator)
parameters.y: lerp(scrolly,camera.Y - clamp(camera.Y - Mouse.Y, -min_camera_distance, min_camera_distance), dt * settings_cam_speed_modificator)

parameters.audio-file-name: choose("bullet whiz","bullet impact hard","bullet impact hard 2")
